title: Re-entry capsule of Shenzhou-8 spacecraft opens
description: Carrying flower seeds and space experiment equipment, the re-entry capsule of Shenzhou-8 spacecraft was opened Monday in Beijing after its safe return to the earth on Nov. 17.
cleanContent:
Researchers retrieve items on board the re-entry capsule of China's unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8 in Beijing, capital of China, Nov. 21, 2011. (Xinhua/Yang Guang)

Photo taken on Nov. 21, 2011 shows the scene of a ceremony, at which the re-entry capsule of China's unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8 will be opened, in Beijing, capital of China. (Xinhua/Yang Guang)

Photo taken on Nov. 21, 2011 shows the re-entry capsule of China's unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8 in Beijing, capital of China. (Xinhua/Yang Guang)

Researchers demonstrate a set of space flowering and fructification experiment devices retrieved from the re-entry capsule of China's unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8 in Beijing, capital of China, Nov. 21, 2011. (Xinhua/Yang Guang)

Guests from central-south China's Hunan Province hold a piece of local embroidery, retrieved from the re-entry capsule of China's unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8, in Beijing, capital of China, Nov. 21, 2011. (Xinhua/Yang Guang)

Carrying flower seeds and space experiment equipment, the re-entry capsule of Shenzhou-8 spacecraft was opened Monday in Beijing after its safe return to the earth on Nov. 17. | |
